SETTINGS.TITLE: QuickBrowse Example Template
SETTINGS.DESCRIPTION: This is an example template for QuickBrowse, use $QB->TEMPLATE->TITLE to get the title for this template.
SETTINGS.AUTHOR: D. van Dooijeweert
SETTINGS.INFO: All settings above are REQUIRED... Because QuickBrowse uses them to call for some data live template version.
SETTINGS.MORE: The setting 'INFO', '', '' and everything below are NOT REQUIRED for QuickBrowse.
SETTINGS.ALSO: There's a SETTINGS part and REQUIRED part to this install.json file, Make sure you use appropriate settings for the 'REQUIRED' part.
